overview: The Witmans is a film about two heart-broken parents. This documentary follows Ron and Sue Witman, fifteen years after their lives were turned upside down. The Witmans looks at how a family clings together after 15 year old Zach Witman was accused and found guilty of murdering his 13 year old brother. Believing their son to be innocent, the Witmans take a 2 hour drive each weekend to visit Zach, who now is serving life in prison.
title: The Witmans
